title: Corda RPC Configuration Schema
description: Configuration schema for the RPC subsection.

description.default: Exposing RPCOps interfaces as OpenAPI WebServices

maxContentLength.description: Maximum length in bytes that can be sent over HTTP transport.

timeoutMs.description: Amount of time in milliseconds to wait for response on Kafka bus for a remote operation before timing out the HTTP RPC call.

idleTimeoutMs.description: Amount of time in milliseconds for a websocket connection to be idle (i.e. no messages are either sent or received) before timing out and closing the connection. Value of 0 means such idle check will be disabled.
